description.value: Table of codes specifying the administered vaccines. The values are maintained by the US Centers of Disease Control. The code system is maintained by the CDC, and may be found at URL; https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewCodeSystem.action?id=2.16.840.1.113883.12.292 The value set is maintained by the CDC and may be found at URL: https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=ABDEE003-77C3-48E7-B941-EBF92B6B81FC

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0292 (Vaccines Administered)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

description.value: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated
